_description: Configuration for cyclic peptide-target binding affinity prediction
_warning: Boltz affinity prediction only supports small molecule ligands, not peptide-peptide interactions

processing._accelerator_comment: cpu or gpu. GPU recommended for affinity calculations
processing._affinity_comment: Specific diffusion samples for affinity calculations

affinity._chain_comment: Target is usually chain A, peptide/ligand is chain B
affinity._length_comment: Recommended maximum peptide length for affinity prediction

validation._warn_comment: Warn if peptide sequence is unusually long for affinity prediction

output._analysis_comment: Parse affinity results and provide interpretation

affinity_thresholds._comment: log10(IC50) thresholds for binding strength classification

short_target.description: Cyclic peptide vs short target protein (may fail due to Boltz limitation)

ligand_protein._comment: This is what should work instead of peptide-peptide affinity
ligand_protein.description: Small molecule ligand (ethanol) vs protein - this format should work

known_limitations: Boltz affinity prediction only supports small molecule ligands
Peptide-peptide affinity prediction will fail with 'Chain B is not a ligand!' error
Use this script as template for ligand-protein affinity predictions
